text: Using Vegetable Oils to Lower Cholesterol May Not Improve Longevity
authors: Fernstrom Is A Professor Of Psychiatry
Surgery At The University Of Pittsburgh Medical Center
A Board Certified Nutrition Specialist The American College Of Nutrition. She Is The Founding Director Of The Upmc Weight Management Center.
title: Using Vegetable Oils to Lower Cholesterol May Not Improve Longevity

og.title: Using Vegetable Oils to Lower Cholesterol May Not Improve Longevity
og.description: Does swapping out all of your saturated fat with unsaturated fat lead to a longer life? A new study suggests the answer may be no.
